name: Wordstine - Anagram Word Game
storyline:
It's very easy to play this game. 
Just connect the letters by swiping over them to find the hidden word from the jumbled Letters. 
If you find the correct word it will be placed on the board above the magnifying glass.  
 
If at any point you feel stuck and need a different perspective to investigate and search within jumbled letters, Just Use the Shuffle helper, It will shuffle all the letters and might help you to identify the word you need to find. 
 
As you play, the difficulty level increases along with your skills!  
 
Wordstine is the perfect game to enjoy your commute or your coffee break. 
 
Enough said :) 
 
Get all excited to Expand your Vocabulary and Improve your Concentration Skills. 
 
Even the smartest Word Game Aficionado will have a real challenge to complete this game. Solve all the Levels and become one of the few "WORDSTINEs".  
 
Highly recommended for fans of Word Searches, Scrabble, Anagram Word & Word Scramble games.
